Dialogue: If that's true, then why'd you save me?

Speaker: blade
Dialogue: I am a hunter.  A weapon.  It's what I do.  It's in my blood.

Speaker: nyssa
Dialogue: Well it's in mine, too.  I'm a pureblood.  I wasn't turned.  I was born this way.  Just like you.  Am I evil because I want to survive?  What about a wolf?  What about any predator?

Speaker: blade
Dialogue: Pain cuts the deepest, isn't that what you said?

Speaker: scud
Dialogue: What's going on?

Speaker: blade
Dialogue: He was here.  Watching us.

Speaker: scud
Dialogue: Nomak?

Speaker: blade
Dialogue: He wants us to know he's hunting us now.

Speaker: nyssa
Dialogue: I don't understand.

Speaker: blade
Dialogue: Where the hell have you been?

Speaker: whistler
Dialogue: Just out connecting a few dots.

Speaker: blade
Dialogue: What's your problem, Whistler?

Speaker: whistler
Dialogue: Why don't you ask your girlfriend?

Speaker: blade
Dialogue: Then who does he work for?

Speaker: whistler
Dialogue: Some biotech outfit called Caliban Industries.  They've been lying to us since day one.  This Nomak fucker didn't evolve.  He was designed.

Speaker: nyssa
Dialogue: I don't know what he's talking about.

Speaker: whistler
Dialogue: You expect us to believe that?  Who you going to trust, Blade?  Me or her?

Speaker: stevens
Dialogue: You?

Speaker: blade
Dialogue: Start talking, bitch.

Speaker: stevens
Dialogue: I don't know what you --

Speaker: blade
Dialogue: Nomak!  You created him!

Speaker: stevens
Dialogue: Ohgodohgodohgod...  PLEASE!  PLEASE!!!

Speaker: blade
Dialogue: Keep talking, Stevens.  Tell me why.

Speaker: stevens
Dialogue: The Shadow Cabinet.  For decades they've been trying to find a way to rid themselves of their hereditary weaknesses.  Viral epidemiology, immunochemistry.  Recombinant DNA was the next logical step.

Speaker: nyssa
Dialogue: No, that's not possible.  They wouldn't keep something like this from me...

Speaker: stevens
Dialogue: Your father didn't want you to know.  Something went wrong.  The Reaper strain was too aggressive.  Then Nomak escaped.

Speaker: whistler
Dialogue: And we're supposed to clean up your mess.  Fucking perfect.

Speaker: stevens
Dialogue: Look, the fact that Nomak was artificially created didn't make the threat any less urgent.  He was still out there, spreading the Reaper virus.

Speaker: blade
Dialogue: The genetic material you spliced into Nomak --  Where did you get it?

Speaker: damaskinos
Dialogue: Jared Nomak is your genetic brother. And I suppose if you follow that line of reasoning to its logical conclusion, then these are your offspring.

Speaker: reinhardt
Dialogue: Put it back in park, Blade.

Speaker: blade
Dialogue: Thought you were dead.

Speaker: reinhardt
Dialogue: Seems like there's a lot of that going around these days.

Speaker: nyssa
Dialogue: Blade!

Speaker: blade
Dialogue: Kiss your ass goodbye, Reinhardt.

Speaker: scud
Dialogue: You're wasting your time, Blade.  The flechette's a dud.

Speaker: reinhardt
Dialogue: Thought you had me on a short leash, didn't you, chief?  Only it turns out, you're the one that's been on the leash.

Speaker: scud
Dialogue: See, I'm one of Damaskinos' familiars.

Speaker: whistler
Dialogue: You little shit.  When did they get to you?

Speaker: scud
Dialogue: Back when Blade had me hunting down your puckered old ass.  What's up with your hair, anyway?  Fucking Willie Nelson look-a-like?

Speaker: blade
Dialogue: I switched that dud of yours back with the real one.

Speaker: reinhardt
Dialogue: Son of a bitch!

Speaker: damaskinos
Dialogue: Reinhardt!

Speaker: reinhardt
Dialogue: What about him, then?  Me and Hobo Kelly here have a little unfinished business.

Speaker: whistler
Dialogue: Not nearly enough, Fritz.

Speaker: reinhardt
Dialogue: Keep talking, warmblood.

Speaker: whistler
Dialogue: Been dead before.  Didn't much cotton to it.  Tell you what, chicken shit.  You do your worst.  We'll settle up after.

Speaker: damaskinos
Dialogue: My child --

Speaker: nyssa
Dialogue: Nomak said something to Blade in Greek. Athelfiki singenia ex amato.  Where did he learn that?

Speaker: damaskinos
Dialogue: From his father, of course.

Speaker: nyssa
Dialogue: You experimented on your own, son?

Speaker: damaskinos
Dialogue: I have fathered thousands of children in centuries since I first walked this earth.  Make no mistake, Nyssa.  Those blood-ties mean nothing to me when measured against the ascendancy of our race.  Nothing.  If you have any interest in remaining alive, you would do well to remember that.

Speaker: damaskinos
Dialogue: With every century, humans become more repulsive to me.  Once, you were souls to be taken, corrupted.  But you have disgraced yourselves to being nothing more than blood and meat.

Speaker: stevens
Dialogue: We're going to harvest you, Blade.  Bone marrow, organs, everything.  Your tissue's too valuable to let go to waste.

Speaker: blade
Dialogue: Nomak is still out there.

Speaker: damaskinos
Dialogue: True, but thanks to you, we know his weakness.  We can keep him contained. It's just a matter of time before we hunt him down.

Speaker: blade
Dialogue: Too bad you're out of it.

Speaker: damaskinos
Dialogue: And why is that?

Speaker: blade
Dialogue: Revenge.  That's what Nomak wanted all along.  To pay back the people who created him.

Speaker: stevens
Dialogue: You may be right.  Fortunately for us, he has no idea where this facility is located.

Speaker: blade
Dialogue: He does now.  He's been watching me since the tunnels. Following me.  I led him right to you.

Speaker: nomak
Dialogue: FATHER!

Speaker: damaskinos
Dialogue: Stop him!

Speaker: reinhardt
Dialogue: Shit!

Speaker: damaskinos
Dialogue: Get out of the way.

Speaker: whistler
Dialogue: Come on, Blade.  Talk to me!

Speaker: blade
Dialogue: Blood...

Speaker: stevens
Dialogue: What are you doing?!!

Speaker: reinhardt
Dialogue: Stop him!!!

Speaker: whistler
Dialogue: GO!!!

Speaker: blade
Dialogue: Tell me something, chief.  Can you blush?

Speaker: damaskinos
Dialogue: Are you insane?  He'll kill us both!

Speaker: nyssa
Dialogue: Maybe it's better that way.

Speaker: damaskinos
Dialogue: For God's sake, Nyssa!  Let us out of here!

Speaker: nomak
Dialogue: Why are you frightened, father?  The prodigal son has returned.

Speaker: blade
Dialogue: Get out of here!

Speaker: nomak
Dialogue: Blood brother.

Speaker: nyssa
Dialogue: How does it look?

Speaker: blade
Dialogue: Not good.

Speaker: nyssa
Dialogue: It won't be long now.  I can already feel it burning inside me --

Speaker: blade
Dialogue: What do you want me to do?

Speaker: nyssa
Dialogue: I want to see the sun rise.

Speaker: nyssa
Dialogue: Each day is a little life.  Remember?

Speaker: rush
Dialogue: -- yelling for your tender touch, you can never get enough --

Speaker: rush
Dialogue: Voulez-vous coucher avec moi, ce soir! Voulez-vous coucher AVEC MOI!!!

Speaker: blade
Dialogue: What?  You think I forgot about you?
